title: ‘Ozark:’ Where We Left Off
description:
Joanna and Van team up to recap how we got to this point in ‘Ozark.’ Plus, they explain what makes each character so compelling, compare the show to other great crime dramas, and look ahead to the fourth and final season.
Hosts: Joanna Robinson and Van Lathan
Associate Producer: Mike Wargon
